activity.name: Phuket Airport
activity.tips: The ideal is to visit the Phi Phi Islands during the region's dry season: between the months December and April. It's good to remember that Phi Phi does not have a low season, but the very high season is December and January.
activity.address: Mai Khao, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

activity.name: Phuket (Rassada Pier)
activity.tips: Buy your ticket direct on the pier. Due to weather condition, check availibity boat schedule. Contact Rassada Harbour +66 84 675 1177
activity.address: Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

activity.name: Boat to Phi Phi Islands
activity.tips: Buy tickets in advance

activity.name: Check in - ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel and Resort
activity.tips: Perfect for LGBTQ+. The best prices are from Booking. The location and the pool are great, also the breakfast is very good
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Efe Mediterranean Cuisine Restaurant
activity.tips: Restaurant with a very cozy atmosphere, beautiful decor and great service. The waiters are extremely nice and helpful. Opens at 12:00
activity.address: Soi Babai 125/22, Moo 7, Phi Phi Don, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Ao Ton Sai Pier
activity.tips: Busy pier in the middle of a stunning landscape where ferries and other boats transport passengers. Wheelchair accessible entrance. Suitable for kids
activity.address: Moo 7, Phi Phi Island Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Italiano Bar & Restaurant Koh Phi Phi
activity.tips: Great restaurant in the heart of phi phi. Original flavors of Italian cuisine at very low prices for the quality offered.
activity.address: 92 7 139, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: 7-Eleven
activity.tips: Chain of convenience stores with quick meals and drinks to go, as well as various kiosk products.
activity.address: Moo 7, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Back to ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Breakfast at ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Phi Phi Viewpoint 3
activity.tips: The best time for photos is around 10 am, when the sun will be behind you and light up the island and the sea. Contact us +66927106807
activity.address: 125/39 Moo 7 Phi Phi Island, Ao Nang, Meaung, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Hike to Long Beach
activity.tips: First navigate your way to Carlitos Bar. Keep following the yellow path towards the Don Chukkit Hotel. There is a turn off once you pass by Rimlay Restaurant. Turn down the path towards the Hippies Bar and from there you’ll have a view of the beach.
activity.address: PQHP+PGM, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Paradise Cuisine Phi Phi
activity.tips: Located just in front of the Paradise resort. Prices are similar if not slightly higher than the other restaraunts at Long Beach. Opens at 12:00
activity.address: PQHQ+W32, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Long Beach
activity.tips: Lovely beach with a coral sand and gently shelving into the beautiful blue water. Not great for swimming, lots of sharp rocks even farther out in the sea.
activity.address: PQHP+PGM, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Return to downtown by Taxi Boat
activity.tips: 10 to 15 minutes

activity.name: ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Slinky Bar
activity.tips: Fireworks shows that take place at different points on the beach, starting at 9 pm. If you participate in the show, you get a shot of drink.
activity.address: PQRF+P48 Andaman Sea, Ao Nang, Amphoe Mueang Krabi, Chang Wat Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Back to ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Breakfast at ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Long Tail Boat
activity.tips: Amazing private boat trip. The captain of the boat was amazing. Super custom trip and they went above and beyond on everything. Opens at 8 am. Book your tour on the website.
activity.address: 125/2 Moo 7 Aonang Subdistrict, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Back to ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Breakfast at ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Check out - ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel and Resort
activity.address: 157, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81210, Thailand

activity.name: Los Angeles International Airport
activity.tips: Good options for food and shopping in terminal. Parking is right next to the departure and arrival gates.
activity.address: 1 World Way, Los Angeles, CA 90045, United States

activity.name: Carl's Jr.
activity.tips: Restaurant sitting area was very clean. Male bathroom were spotless. Food and service was great.
activity.address: Los Angeles International Airport, Terminal 8, Sp 8E, 1 World Way, Los Angeles, CA 90045, United States

activity.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art
activity.tips: 8-hectare campus with various collections on the history of art, which also hosts screenings and concerts. This lights art installation is amazing and worth the visit to this place. It really lights up our spirits too.
activity.address: 5905 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90036, United States

activity.name: Check-in - Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Hollywood Walk of Fame, an IHG Hotel
activity.tips: It is a 10-minute drive from Universal Studios Hollywood™ and the Hollywood Walk of Fame. The property also has easy access to public transportation: Hollywood - Highland Station is a 7-minute walk away.
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Walk to Hall of Fame
activity.tips: 5 minutes by car and 20 minutes on foot. A tip to help you search for your favorite stars is the website Star Finder. If you want a quieter place, go between 6am and 10am
activity.address: Hollywood Boulevard, Vine St, Los Angeles, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Madame Tussauds Hollywood
activity.tips: The famous Hollywood wax museum has 115 statues of celebrities. There, the areas are divided by themes and personalities. The museum has several branches, but it can be considered one of the unmissable activities for adults and children alike.
activity.address: 6933 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Jack's Candy
activity.tips: Jack’s Candy in DTLA is the best place to shop for your party supplies and candy. Super safe to shop at store is really clean and organized. If you are traveling with children, this visit is essential!
activity.address: 777 S Central Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90021, United States

activity.name: Dolby Theatre
activity.tips: Tours depart every 30 minutes and take tourists to different areas of the theater, backstage, in chairs reserved for certain artists, in addition to showing an original copy of the Oscar, highly protected.
activity.address: 6801 Hollywood Blvd, Hollywood, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Hard Rock Cafe
activity.tips: Your COVID vaccination proof and ID are needed to enter the restaurant. To the food and service that were awesome. The atmosphere is smooth, the music is great, lighting is well thought out and the entire place is spotless.
activity.address: 6801 Hollywood Blvd Suite 105, Los Angeles, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Back to Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Walk to Rodeo Drive
activity.tips: If you’re looking for designer clothes, Rodeo Drive is the place to go. However, it’s also a great place to find affordable clothes as well. Many of the stores on Rodeo Drive offer lower prices than other stores in the city.
activity.address: Santa Monica Blvd at Wilshire Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90210, United States

activity.name: Dave & Busters
activity.tips: It’s a great place to hang out with family or friends or celebrate a birthday. You can relax and have appetizers while watching a baseball or basketball game, if you’re not into sports you can play a plethora of games.
activity.address: 6815 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Hollywood & Highland Center
activity.tips: The Shopping center that houses the Oscar theater, brings together good restaurants and a very megalomaniac architecture, referring to epic Hollywood productions
activity.address: 6815 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028, United States

activity.name: Paramount Studios
activity.tips: It is located in Burbank, a city very close to Los Angeles, less than 1 hour away, with regular buses that stop at the door of the studio. There are three types of tours available that vary in price and duration
activity.address: PQHP+PGM, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81000, Thailand

activity.name: Osteria La Buca
activity.tips: Osteria was delicious farm to table Italian food. The short rib ravioli and the Bolognese was amazing. Highly recommend this as a really great experience for a nice Italian meal. Fresh ingredients, great service
activity.address: 5210 Melrose Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90038, United States

activity.name: Back to Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: The Broad Museum
activity.tips: You have to make ticket reservations online in advance; note that the general admission ticket is separate from the infinity room tickets, so you need to make sure you select both things when reserving tickets.
activity.address: 221 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012, United States

activity.name: Yuko Kitchen Wilshire
activity.tips: Such huge portions for a healthy and filling rice bowl! They have excellent vegan options and sweets too. Opens at 11 am
activity.address: 5484 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90036, United States

activity.name: La Brea Tar Pits
activity.tips: One of the most interesting tourist attractions in Los Angeles. La Brea is a set of tar pits that sprouted from the earth thousands of years ago and which, throughout history, trapped and fossilized Ice Age animals and plants.
activity.address: 5801 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90036, United States

activity.name: Griffith Observatory
activity.tips: One of the best spots in the city of Los Angeles to see the Hollywood Sign and the entire city skyline, especially during sunset. ($7 for adults and $3 for children and seniors).
activity.address: 2800 E Observatory Rd, Los Angeles, CA 90027, United States

activity.name: Agua Viva
activity.tips: The drinks and food here are delicious. The classic margarita it was fantastic. The 'make your own sushi' was a different take but fun to eat and tasty as well, the salmon was fresh! The chicken had a great mix of flavors, it was juicy and tender.
activity.address: 100 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012, Estados Unidos

activity.name: Walt Disney Concert Hall
activity.tips: Designed by Canadian architect Frank Gehry, it took 16 years to complete due to its bold design. The concert hall itself is so incredibly laid out that acoustically it's one of the best concert Halls I've ever visited in the entire world.
activity.address: 111 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012, United States

activity.name: Back to Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Disneyland Park
activity.tips: Disneyland, is in the city of Anaheim, 1 hour away from Los Angeles. With two theme parks, an entertainment, shopping and dining center, and three hotels, the entire complex is relatively small – you can explore everything on foot.
activity.address: 1313 Disneyland Dr, Anaheim, CA 92802, United States

activity.name: Alien Pizza Planet
activity.tips: This delicious restaurant simulates the Pizza Planet restaurant, from the movie Toy Story and it works in fast-food style.
activity.address: 1313 Disneyland Dr, Anaheim, CA 92802, United States

activity.name: Blue Bayou Restaurant
activity.tips: This French food restaurant is perfect for couples traveling on their honeymoon, as the restaurant is all themed in a romantic way, making you forget the madness of an amusement park.
activity.address: 1313 Disneyland Dr, Anaheim, CA 92802, United States

activity.name: Back to Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Universal Studios Hollywood
activity.tips: The first step for anyone wanting to visit Universal Studios is to download the park app. In it you can find interactive maps, waiting times for attractions and show times.
activity.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

activity.name: Hollywood & Dine
activity.tips: Dine like the Stars and let your taste buds enjoy a selection of seasonal favorites and delicious culinary dishes. Also come back for a Freshly Made Funnel Cake with Strawberry & Ice Cream toppings!
activity.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

activity.name: iFLY
activity.tips: Indoor Skydiving at iFLY Hollywood's vertical wind tunnel is safe for kids, challenging for adults, exciting for teens and realistic for skydivers.
activity.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

activity.name: Can’t-Miss Experiences in Hogsmeade
activity.tips: Don’t miss the new additions at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ including new wand magic experiences and the arrival of Butterbeer™ hard pack ice-cream!
activity.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

activity.name: Antojitos Cocina Mexicana
activity.tips: Explore the tastes, sounds and sights of Mexico at Antojitos Cocina Mexicana, authentic Mexican cuisine in the heart of the Universal CityWalk.
activity.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Hotel
activity.address: 1921 N Highland Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90068, United States

activity.name: Venice Beach
activity.tips: The most famous beach in the city of Los Angeles. Walking along its busy seaside promenade and its iconic piers is quite pleasant. It is a great option for anyone who wants to relax and enjoy one side of the city by bicycle or rollerblading.
activity.address: 84. Ocean Front Walk and Rose Avenue SM, Venice, CA 90291, United States

activity.name: The Butcher's Daughter
activity.tips: Open all day with vegetarian & vegan dishes, plus juices in a laid-back space. The vegan breakfast sausages and the lemon waffles was amazing. The pastries were also very good.
activity.address: 1205 Abbot Kinney Blvd, Venice, CA 90291, United States

activity.name: Santa Monica Pier
activity.tips: Be ready for the crowds of people that come here and bring your jacket because it can get pretty cold. There are many great spots to take pictures and spend time with family and friends here.
activity.address: 200 Santa Monica Pier, Santa Monica, CA 90401, United States

activity.name: High Rooftop Lounge
activity.tips: Very nice location, very good to admire the sunset over Venice.
activity.address: XGPH+V5 Venice, Los Angeles, CA, EUA

activity.name: Los Angeles International Airport
activity.tips: Good options for food and shopping in terminal. Parking is right next to the departure and arrival gates.
